titleStmt.title: The benefite that Christians receiue by Iesus Christ crucifyed. Translated out of French into English, by A.G. 1573
Dal beneficio di Christo. English
titleStmt.author: Benedetto, da Mantova, fl. 1534-1541.
Flaminio, Marco Antonio, 1498-1550.
Golding, Arthur, 1536-1606, attributed name.
Paleario, Aonio, 1503-1570, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Thomas East,] for Lucas Harison and George Bishop,

notesStmt.note: By Benedetto da Mantova; revised by Marco Antonio Flaminio.
Sometimes attributed, erroneously, to Antonio dalla Paglia [i.e. Aonio Paleario].
Originally published as: Dal beneficio di Christo.
Running title reads: The benefyte of Christes death.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
